TopicTitle: The Name Change Thread (WARNING! ONE TIME ONLY!)

Articles.Content: Post Your Name Change Requests Here! If you would like to have your username changed, please post here. State what you would like your name changed to. The moderators will see if that's available. If the name is not already taken by another user, and it meets our Forum Guidelines, it should be approved, and will be changed in short order. You are only allowed 1 (one) name change. It can be hard to keep track of who is who if everybody keeps changing their name. So think wisely about the change, it won't be undone. *------ End Moderator Edit. Original Post Follows ------* This one is awful. **Edited July 16, 2022 by Gargamel** Added moderator note

Moved to the Forum Forum.

Yep, everyone gets exactly one chance for a username change, so make sure you pick one you'll be happy sticking with. I'll hail the folks who can arrange it for you. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

**Edited <time datetime="2014-02-02T04:40:23Z" title="02/02/2014 04:40  AM" data-short="10 yr">February 2, 2014</time> by vexx32**

It looks like a super name to me ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Okay pick another and send it to me via PM please.
Is it possible to change ones username on the KSP forum?

Yes.

We will only do it once per person, though.
oh cool, are you somone who can change my name?
could you change it to ImperialistPigDog

> 
> oh cool, are you somone who can change my name?

Yes.

> 
> could you change it to ImperialistPigDog

Are you one hundred percent sure that's what you want? Remember, you can't change it to something else *or* change it back once it's done.
Yes I'm 100%, thanks man!

> 
> Yes.
> We will only do it once per person, though.

Can you change mine to Heckspress?

P.S. Maybe make this a name change request forum
Okay Heckspress, but be aware you will need to use Heckspress to login.

> 
> P.S. Maybe make this a name change request forum

This is actually a great idea!

Yeah, it'll be like the "need a thread moved or deleted" thread.

"Need Your Username Changed?"

This is a thread where you can post a request to have your forum username changed to whatever you select. (within reason)

Post on here with your request for a name change, and the new name you want.

**Warning!!!**

You only get **one** name change! Once you change your name, the new name is permanent, no exceptions. So choose wisely!

I will be monitoring this thread closely and PMing Sal\_vager with any requests to make sure they are all taken care of. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-28T19:11:30Z" title="05/28/2015 07:11  PM" data-short="9 yr">May 28, 2015</time> by Endersmens**

Sorry, but the "Can you change your username" thread has taken all of your thunder on this one. Not trying to be rude, just saying.

Also, I don't want my name changed now.

> 
> Sorry, but the "Can you change your username" thread has taken all of your thunder on this one. Not trying to be rude, just saying.
> Also, I don't want my name changed now.

Except, that was a question that got answered. A few people chimed in with requests. 

There's been about...4 or 5 threads like that have popped up recently. They always die. This thread is supposed to be permanent, and sal\_vager OKed this thread to be official. I'm gonna ask about a sticky also.

Can I change my name to Fel?

I also wonder how effective this would be, this isn't the most popular part of the forums, after all.

> 
> Can I change my name to Fel?

Careful with that. ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

Speaking for myself but if i change username it won't change my (more or less weird xDr) typing habits. (neuronal schemes deeply binded somewhere related things i guess) + i *feel in accordance with* this current nick so no point to change it.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-26T03:41:40Z" title="05/26/2015 03:41  AM" data-short="9 yr">May 26, 2015</time> by WinkAllKerb''**
Guys, if this is going to be an official thread for a specific purpose, y'all need to stop posting off-topic and chatty stuff to it.
I just want the "P" in my username to be a capital letter.

> 
> I just want the "P" in my username to be a capital letter.

That was a small change, but changed nonetheless.

> 
> That was a small change, but changed nonetheless.

Thanks. I have no interest in changing my name now or ever. I use this username for most things. The lowercase letter bothered me, though.
Keep it on-topic, guys.
Can i have my username changed to WhizzKid
